description: This file contains the main application logic for a Flutter-based note-taking app, including UI components, data models, state management with Provider, and local database integration with sqflite.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: Root widget setting up theming and state management for the app.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Model class representing a note with serialization methods.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: State management class handling notes data and SQLite database operations.

classes.name: NotesListScreen
classes.description: Main UI screen displaying list of notes, search, and add options.

classes.name: NoteEditScreen
classes.description: Screen for creating and editing individual notes.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for various widgets like NotesApp, NotesListScreen, etc.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Initializes database and loads notes into state.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Creates a new note and saves it to the database.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by id.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Removes note by id from database and state.

methods.name: setSearchQuery
methods.description: Filters notes based on search query.

methods.name: buildSuggestions
methods.description: Builds search suggestions as user types.

methods.name: saveNote
methods.description: Handles the form submission to save or update a note.
